GUI related Sprites and Groups¶

This module implements some elements which are helpful in the creation of guis or more generally event interaction with sprites. This module is incomplete.

class spyral.gui.DragSprite[source]¶

Bases: spyral.gui.MouseSprite

A Sprite which derives from MouseSprite, and supports all of its features, but allows for dragging and dropping the sprite.

class spyral.gui.GUIGroup(*args)[source]¶

Bases: spyral.sprite.Group

A group class which automatically handles the behavior of GUI sprites. The behavior is otherwise the same in every way.s

class spyral.gui.MouseSprite(*args)[source]¶

Bases: spyral.sprite.Sprite

A Sprite class to handle mouse hovering and clicks. It conforms to layers for event prioritizing. The following attributes may be useful:

click_rect = None represents a rectangle for clickable area. If None, the sprite’s rect is used.
hover_rect = None represents a rectangle for hoverable area. If None, the sprite’s rect is used.
consume_clicks = True is whether a click on this sprite should be consumed, or allowed to pass on to other Sprites on this update.
consume_hover = False is whether this sprite blocks lower sprites from being hovered over. Only consumes per group, not globally.
enable_right = False is whether right clicks should trigger a click event
enable_middle = False is whether middle clicks should trigger a click event
on_click(event)[source]¶

Called when this sprite is clicked.

on_middle_click(event)[source]¶

Called when this sprite is middle clicked, if enabled.

on_mouse_off()[source]¶

Called when the mouse stops hovering over this sprite.

on_mouse_over()[source]¶

Called when the mouse begins hovering over this sprite.

Called when this sprite is right clicked, if enabled.
